participant_1.background:
I am proud of my family's history and culture.
i am a special ed teacher.
I love to start my day with some quiet time to myself.
i don t trust anyone.
I read a lot and spend my time on community activities.

participant_2.background:
I have a pet cat who loves to nap on my bed.
I am far away from my sister and family.
I like to keep my social media use to a minimum, but I love honey bees!
I like to spend my free time doing activities that I can profit from, like selling items online or doing odd jobs for people.
i drive a van.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
I am doing well today, thank you for asking! How about you?
My day is going great so far! I am looking forward to getting some reading done later.
That sounds like a great way to spend your day! I love to read as well.
What are some of your favorite books?
I love reading all kinds of books, but I especially enjoy historical fiction and mystery novels.
Those are both great genres! I love learning about history through books.
Me too! I also love the suspense of a good mystery novel.
What are some of your favorite historical fiction novels?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon. It is a historical fiction series set in Scotland in the 1700s.
I have heard great things about that series! I have been meaning to check it out.
I highly recommend it! It is a great series with a lot of interesting characters.
Thanks for the recommendation! I will definitely add it to my reading list.
